dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 200 Roman fonts, each annotated with 37 attribute scores, including shape-related attributes like 'serif', 'italic', and perceptual qualities such as 'friendly', 'warm', and 'happy'.
dcterms:title: Font Attribute Dataset
